skills.name: BOMB
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 45% Chance to inflict up to 2 Magic Burns.
• Damage increases based on your MAX HP and DEF

skills.name: FORTUNE
desc: • Heals all allies for 25% of CURRENT HP.
• 45% Chance for each ally to gain Accuracy Up for 2 turns.
• Accuracy Up increases the chance of skill effects triggering by 25%.

skills.name: FLEX
desc: • Raise DEF and MR of all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
• Grant Immunity to Doom, Crave, and Perfect Crave to all allies..
